Farm Items
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: Monster Rancher DS FAQ: Item Lists: Farm Items
By Thorr on Sunday, August 8, 2010 - 08:50 am:

These farm items are vital for raising your monsters effectively. You should acquire these as soon as you can. Each item is acquired in a specific tournament.

ItemFunctionTourneyClass
SculptureReduce FatigueM9 W1D
Gemini's PotReduce StressM6 W1D
Weather DollReduce fatigue in the SPRINGM8 W3D
Ice CubeReduce Stress in the SummerM9 W1B
Cricket ChimeReduce X in FallM9 W1C
Fire StoneReduce X in WinterM2 W3A
Music BoxRest is more effectiveM10 W4S
